title.english: How shall I avert my gaze from your visage?

commentary: Epitomizing the love-like connection of the Sufi aspirant to their Murshid, Guru, or Master.
Like many qawwalis of this genre, there are many valid interpretations, depending on one's predisposition.
However, what keeps a single interpretation is that the poem is an allegory for the underlying single-minded loving devotion to One.
The 'Beloved' (the point of focus) is referred to with masculine language - yet feminine traits are frequently used (e.g. the veil) to describe It, adding delicate nuance.
lyrics: kiven mukhre ton nazaran hatawan
How shall I avert my gaze from your visage?
ve tere vicho rab disda
Within you, I see only God!
menu shonk mahi tere deedar da
I have a desire, my Beloved, to regard you.
mukh rab da hai mukh sarkar da
Your countenance is that of God! And of the Regent!
kiven mukhre ton nazaran hatawan
How shall I avert my gaze from your visage?
ve tere vicho rab disda
Within you, I see only God!
tera naam asa di tasbih a
Repeating thy name is equivalent to me, of glorifying God's!
teri pooja namaza sadiyan a
Your worship and prayer, this is my realm.
tera mukhra sohniya baitullah
Your face is the house of God.
kaabay da nazara tu hai
Your sight is the equivalent to the spectacle of the Kaaba!
kiven mukhre ton nazaran hatawan
How shall I avert my gaze from your visage?
ve tere vicho rab disda
Within you, I see only God!
is ishq di marz anokhi hai
These illnesses induced by love - are unique.
nahi hatdi vedh hakeema ton
They cannot be cured by doctors or apothecaries.
tere samne marzan ghat jawan
In your presence, my pains are lessened.
mere dard da chara tu hai
The cure to my sufferings is you!
kiven mukhre ton nazaran hatawan
How shall I avert my gaze from your visage?
ve tere vicho rab disda
Within you, I see only God!
yaar iman te yaar hi kaaba
My beloved is my faith and my house of worship.
odi deed khuda di deed hai
His manners are the manners of God!
kiven mukhre ton nazaran hatawan
How shall I avert my gaze from your visage?
ve tere vicho rab disda
Within you, I see only God!
nahi tere nazarayo ji par da
Witnessing you does not fulfill my soul.
tenu takda rava ahio ji karda
To go on regarding you - that is my inner self's wish!
kiven mukhre ton nazaran hatawan
How shall I avert my gaze from your visage?
ve tere vicho rab disda
Within you, I see only God!
mahi ain je samne na hovey
If my Beloved is not present before me,
parhi hoi vi qaza ho jandi aey
Then even a completed prayer is considered incomplete.
mukh dekhna tera hajj sada
To observe your face is considered a pilgrimage by me.
teri deed namaz a sadi
Your behaviors are my very worship!
teri soorat usda naqsha hai
Your form is a map of that One.
koi rab di soorat hor nahi
There is no other form of God!
ji karda aey tenu vekhi jawa
I desire to continue regarding you.
ve tere vicho rab disda
Within you, I see only God!
vekh ke teri naaz adavan
Looking at your hypnotic ways,
lakh lakh vari mein sadqe jawa
Thousand of times - I am a sacrifice!
qaza hoiyan namaza ada hove
My incomplete prayers become complete and approved.
sade samne aakay betha reh
Come sit before me,
teri deed da chah nazran na chura
I am excited by your manners! Don't steal my eyes!
zra nazar mila ke betha reh
Fix your eyes on mine - and stay seated!
kund vich tou chupa na mukhre nu
Do not conceal your visage beneath the veil,
aj hajj gareeb da hovan de
Today, let the pilgrimage of the poor One be completed.
rajj rajj ke nazara vekh laiye
Let us satisify our eyes with delight,
palla mukh to la ke betha reh
Dropping the veil from thy visage - stay seated!
je aa gya naal sabab de tou
If you have come today, with good fortune.
ajj tehar jaa wasta rabb da
Then please stay a while - for the sake of God!
kujh meriyan sun kujh apniya keh
Listen to some of mines, and tell some of yours.
ro ro ke hanju suk gaye ne
Crying eternally, my tears have dried up.
tarey vi gin gin muk gaye ne
Counting them, I have exhausted even the stars!
koi ja akho kiyon ruk gaye ne
Someone go ask them - why have they stopped shining?
aa sajna tere raahi bethey
Here my Beloved, let me sit before your path.
baal naina de divay
Burn the candles of your eyes.
nit nit dard vichora tera
Everday, seperation from you, is an unbearable pain.
mera khoon jigar da peevay
My love has drained and drunk all of my blood!
teri deed umeed hai jeenay di
Your manners are my hope for living.
ik pal araam na thivey
For an instant, they don't allow me to live in peace.
zra naazan walya samne aa
You, the one with intoxicating gaze, please appear before me, for a moment.
ajj ankhiyan milaan nu ji karda
Because today, I wish for our eyes to meet.
aa fer husan lishkaar ke aa
Come and radiate your beauty once more,
sada katal ho jaan nu ji karda
For I wish to be murdered today!
aa kaliyan zulfan de naag lara
Come and sting, like a cobra, with your deep black eyes.
bismil nu bismil hor bana
Make this restless one, even more restless!
chad dooriyan nu kadi kol te aa
Forget the distance, just once, come close.
dukh sunan sunaan nu dil karda ay
For I wish to speak my agonies, and hear of your pains.
kami kehri husan de shah de
What is lacking in the king of beauty?
ki parwah be-parwahan de
What care do the carefree have?
ajj sohniyan teer nigahan de
Come handsome One, with the spears of your sight.
seene vich khaan nu ji karda aey
I wish to impaled with those spears in my chest!
madhosh bana de mahbooba
Come and make me irrational, my Beloved,
teri mast nigah de sadke
By virtue of your joyous gaze.
ajj bismil ker ke tarpa de
Make me wounded and anguished,
teri naaz o ada de sadqe
By virtue of your pride and manners!
ji karda aey tenu vekhi jawa
I desire to keep regarding you,
ve tere vicho rab disda
Within you, I see only God!
teri deed talawat meri
Your actions are my prayer recitations.
mere samne teri soorat rahe
Before me, may there be only thy silhouette.
maza tai yaar ibadat da ae
Joy in my prayers comes only, my Beloved,
namaz de har har sajde vich
In each and every prostration,
jado dholan samne tu hove
When you are before me!
teri deed talawat meri
Your actions are my prayer recitations.
aeh dua hai rafiq di har vele
This is my prayer, at every moment,
mera saah nikle tere qadma te
That my last breathe pass at your footsteps.
mein qabar de vich vee sohniya
That even when I lie in my tomb,
jad ankh khola samne tu hove
When I open my eyes, I see only you, even there!
teri deed talawat meri
Your actions are my prayer recitations.
bena kol ibadat meri
Sitting near you, is my prayer.
kadi tere kolo uth ke na jawa
I pray that I never leave your side and go elsewhere.
vey tere vicho rab disda
Within you, I see only God!
tu mera mein teri hova
You become mine, and I become yours.
jag de kolo tenu khova
From the world, I shall steal you away.
tenu akhiyan de vich mein lukawa
I shall conceal you away in my eyes!
ve tere vicho rabb disda
Within you, I see only God!
husan tere di khair manawa
I pray blessings upon your beauty,
je tak le te mein tar jawa
If you regard me once, I shall float through this world ocean!
jogi mil jaan kadma ch thawa
The ascetic prays to find a place at your footsteps!
ve tere vicho rabb disda
Within you, I see only God!
